featured.text: Brazil’s Environmental Ministry estimates that in 1970, 99 percent of the original Amazon Rainforest remained, but in 2000, only 85 percent.
It is estimated that there are currently over 500,000 pieces of man-made trash orbiting the Earth at speeds of up to 17,500 miles per hour.
The EPA estimates that the average levels of dioxin in all Americans are so high that we can expect to see a variety of health effects, including cancer.
It is estimated that US$20 million is needed to complete the project by 2009.

other.text: An estimated 2.5 million tons of carbon dioxide were generated in 2006 by the production of plastic for bottled water.

Even though 65% of teens claim that they rely on themselves for their fashion ideas, it is estimated that less than 20% of the teen population is innovative enough to drive fashion trends, according to a recent study by a marketing firm.
It is estimated that more than 33 million acres of Amazonian Rainforest disappear every year.

definition.zh_def: 估計；評估某事物的價值、數量或程度。
definition.en_def: To roughly calculate or judge the value, number, quantity, or extent of something.
definition.example: We need to estimate the cost of the project before we proceed.
